title: smoothie
author: smoothie
created_time: August 18, 2022, 07:08:39 AMLast edit: February 24, 2023, 12:21:24 AM by smoothie
content: LEALANA BITCOIN CENTS w/ "RAINBOWS AND UNICORNS"====================================BITCOIN CENTS ~ 0.01 BTC DenominationONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC Nickel plated Brass coins           ONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coins (choose 1 of 4 designs A/B/C/D) NEW                   PRICE = SOLD OUTONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC Brass coins          ONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coins (choose 1 of 4 designs A/B/C/D) NEW                    PRICE = SOLD OUT====================================4-COIN SETS randomly selected MATCHING # ROLLS of 20 of all FOUR COIN types (80 coins total)PRICE = SOLD OUT**To be clear the set numbers selected will be random but each of the 4 rolls will have those randomly selected numbers to create 4-coin sets.If you are ordering the rainbow 4-coin sets you will receive the following:You get 80 coins total  (TWENTY 4-coin sets) that consist of:ONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC Nickel plated Brass coins  ONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coins  (Design A, B, C, or D) NEW ONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC Brass coinsONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coins (Design A, B, C, or D) NEWSet #'s are randomly selected. Coin numbers in a particular set will be of the same random number.====================================10-COIN SETS What I’ve decided to do for “10-coin sets”.Here are the details:Max 10-coin set mintage = 25 setsAll 25 sets will be guaranteed to have a # between #1 and #40.The set # will be randomly chosen within that # range (1-40).All 10 coins in a particular set will have the same serial #.10-coin sets can either be funded or unfunded (i.e. all holograms marked “BUYER FUNDED”). Preferably all funded or none would be better as it is a set.  PRICE = SOLD OUTWhat you will receive:ONE 0.01 BTC Nickel plated Brass coinONE 0.01 BTC Brass coinONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coin  (Design A) NEW ONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coin  (Design B) NEW ONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coin  (Design C) NEW ONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coin  (Design D) NEW ONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coin  (Design A) NEW ONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coin  (Design B) NEW ONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coin  (Design C) NEW ONE 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coin  (Design D) NEW Whomever has publicly shown interest, privately shown interest in ordering these coins, or has paid for an order for these new coins as of forum time August 19, 2022, 09:07:43 AM will get first dibs on purchasing these sets.BITCOIN ADDRESS, SERIAL #, AND KEY  =========================================Each individual coin is sold with two copies of the private key. One is printed on paper and the other is put on to the coin itself under the hologram. Both copies of the key are under the respective coin's hologram.Bitcoin addresses and associated serial #’s are also visible on the back of each coin. SEE EXAMPLE BELOW:HOW TO ORDER:Send me a private message on Bitcointalk.org or send an email to Smoothie@lealana.com with the following order format (see below).If you are purchasing either type of rainbow coin (brass or nickel plated) please be sure to noteWhich design (A, B, C, or D) you are ordering. Each roll will be of one design only ((A, B, C, or D)).Mix and matching of RAINBOW designs within a roll of 20 coins is NOT ALLOWED.Code:Example order #1:Matching numbered sets = NOONE Roll of of 20 x 0.01 BTC Nickel plated Brass coins  TWO Rolls of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coins  (DESIGN B) NEW THREE Rolls of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coins (DESIGN A) NEWExample order #2:Matching numbered sets = YESONE Roll of of 20 x 0.01 BTC Nickel plated Brass coins  ONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Nickel Plated Brass coins  (DESIGN B) NEW ONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC Brass coinsONE Roll of 20 x 0.01 BTC RAINBOW Brass coins (DESIGN B) NEWExample Order #3:ONE complete Matching numbered 10-coin setPLEASE BE SAFE AND WATCH OUT FOR SCAMMERS ASKING FOR PAYMENT WITH SIMILAR USERNAMES.ALL PAYMENT MESSAGES WILL BE PGP SIGNED WITH MY PUBLIC KEY ON MY SIGNATURE. LINK - https://bitcoin-otc.com/viewgpg.php?nick=SmoothieSHIPPINGUS Domestic Shipping = $40International Shipping = $60FRONT RAINBOW DESIGNS ======================You may select from 4 types of rainbow designs labeled A, B, C, and DNote - these designs apply to both Nickel-plated and Brass coin types.Design A - Tribalb]  DESIGN A BRASS AND NICKEL VERSIONS VERSION SOLD OUT[/b]Design B - Colored in B with hints of tribal         DESIGN B BRASS AND NICKEL VERSIONS VERSION SOLD OUTDesign C - Border colored with BTC tribal.        DESIGN C BRASS VERSION SOLD OUTNickel-Plated Brass Rainbow Design C still available (1 roll left). .        DESIGN C NICKEL-PLATED BRASS VERSION SOLD OUT Design D - Binary & BTC symbols    DESIGN D NICKEL VERSION SOLD OUTBrass Rainbow Design D still available.        DESIGN D BRASS VERSION SOLD OUTBITCOIN CENT MintagesNickel Plated Brass = 2000RAINBOW Nickel-plated Brass = 560 (140 for each of A, B, C, and D designs)Brass = 2000RAINBOW Brass = 560 (140 for each of A, B, C, and D designs)10-coin sets = 25 sets MAXCoin numbers are randomly selected.PGP SIGNED LISTS=====================================SINGLE ROLLS - PGP-signed lists will be provided for each roll. Entire roll of 20 BTC addresses will be signed in a single PGP-signed message.MATCHING 4-COIN SET ROLLS - PGP-signed BTC addresses will be provided for each numbered 4-coin set. TERMS AND CONDITIONS: www.lealana.com/tac.phpTURNAROUND TIMECOINS WILL BE SHIPPED 2 to 3 WEEKS AFTER PAYMENT HAS BEEN MADE AND ASSUMING FUNDING OF THE COIN ADDRESSES ARE DONE IN A TIMELY MANNER. IN SOME CASES IT MAY SHIP SOONER. ALL COINS ARE REQUIRED TO BE FUNDED BY THE CUSTOMER BEFORE SHIPMENT. All Shipments are shipped via USPS Registered Mail with restricted delivery (meaning you have to show your ID and sign for the package).If you wish to purchase Lealana BTC brass/nickel coins and do not wish to fund the coins, you may do so but each coin’s hologram will be marked as “BUYER FUNDED” denoting this coin was never funded before it shipped.FUNDING YOUR COIN(S) <—— Important1. All coins intended on being funded are required to be funded BEFORE they are shipped out. Any digital value that is stored on the coins while in transit are at your sole risk and responsibility. Lealana is not responsible for any digital cryptocurrency value while in transit by mail courier.2. Your coin addresses will be PGP signed and sent to you for you to fund with the EXACT face value of (0.01 BTC).3. You will have up until the 2nd week from the time of your order to fund the addresses. 4. Should you miss this deadline your coin shipment will be delayed. Rainbow ART ALIGNMENT The rainbow artwork on the coin will be aligned on a best-effort basis. No coin alignment is perfect, no coin is perfect either.ERROR COINSSeptember 5th 2022 Update: For the collectors out there, here is an interesting find I came across.It appears the first 'L' in LEALANA is in the wrong place leaving a gap between the rest of the characters in the name spelling "L   EALANA".After going through the inventory these are the current counts I've found for each type.3 for Nickel Rainbow Design D6 for Brass Rainbow Design DThese are being included in the production sales and shipping out with customer orders. Be on the look out to see if you can find one or more of these in your rolls.If I find anymore (which I doubt) I will discard them/destroy them.Not sure how this happened. But it definitely to me is categorized as an error. You be the judge.

comments.author: CoinageMint
comments.body: Nice to see some new Lealana coins  Lots of detail in the BTC and the holos looks 1st class.Great work as usual smoothie

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: awesome to see these! I might have missed it but is there a way to just buy a single coin of each version? if not, maybe we can do a group buy with 20 folks and buy a roll of each and then split it 20 ways?Quote4-COIN SETSrandomly selected MATCHING # ROLLS of 20 of all FOUR COIN types (80 coins total)PRICE = 0.18 BTCwould be .009 per set with 20 sets available.

I might have missed it but is there a way to just buy a single coin of each version? if not, maybe we can do a group buy with 20 folks and buy a roll of each and then split it 20 ways?would be .009 per set with 20 sets available.Count me in for 2 sets if you want to move forward with this!One question though, I would want the funded coins...  Hopefully this is offered directly by Smoothie.   Let me know, else I am going to order a set of the basic brass ones. as these are just too cool to miss out on.

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: I'm in for 2 sets if this group buy plays out

comments.author: tweetious
comments.created_time: August 18, 2022, 04:06:25 PMLast edit: August 18, 2022, 04:17:11 PM by tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on August 18, 2022, 03:00:55 PMawesome to see these! I might have missed it but is there a way to just buy a single coin of each version? if not, maybe we can do a group buy with 20 folks and buy a roll of each and then split it 20 ways?Quote4-COIN SETSrandomly selected MATCHING # ROLLS of 20 of all FOUR COIN types (80 coins total)PRICE = 0.18 BTCwould be .009 per set with 20 sets available.I might be interested in joining the group buy too... Are you considering acquiring funded (0.01 BTC) OR buyer-funded coins (sets/rolls) ? If I understood correctly from the OP, you will need to provide an additional 0.8 BTC for funding the 80 coins.Furthermore, for the "RAINBOW Nickel-plated Brass" & "BTC RAINBOW Brass coins", there are 4 designs each (A, B, C, and D), hence a truly full set/collection should consist of 10 coins?

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.created_time: August 18, 2022, 04:18:29 PMLast edit: August 18, 2022, 06:52:01 PM by MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: I was planning on the unfunded. as for the coins - I was keeping it simple and doing the 4 coin sets he has listed for .18 for the 80 coins (20 of 4 types)Let me get thru the work day today and let me try to reach out to smoothie and see if he would be willing to set aside the set while I gather funding from interested parties.

comments.author: markinaz
comments.body: Quote from: smoothie on August 18, 2022, 07:08:39 AMLEALANA BITCOIN CENTS w/ "RAINBOWS AND UNICORNS"BITCOIN ADDRESS, SERIAL #, AND KEY  =========================================Each individual coin is sold with two copies of the private key. One is printed on paper and the other is put on to the coin itself under the hologram.I am curious, is this a typo?  I did not think earlier Lealana coins would have a printed out copy of the private key.  This seems like it could affect the resale of the coin, since the PK would be seen by the original purchaser/receiver.   I imagine for customs too, some packages are searched, and I know I don't trust most government employees (no offense anyone).

comments.author: tweetious
comments.created_time: August 18, 2022, 04:30:57 PMLast edit: August 18, 2022, 05:30:44 PM by tweetious
comments.body: Quote from: Markzellers on August 18, 2022, 04:23:22 PMQuote from: smoothie on August 18, 2022, 07:08:39 AMLEALANA BITCOIN CENTS w/ "RAINBOWS AND UNICORNS"BITCOIN ADDRESS, SERIAL #, AND KEY  =========================================Each individual coin is sold with two copies of the private key. One is printed on paper and the other is put on to the coin itself under the hologram.I am curious, is this a typo?  I did not think earlier Lealana coins would have a printed out copy of the private key.  This seems like it could affect the resale of the coin, since the PK would be seen by the original purchaser/receiver.   I imagine for customs too, some packages are searched, and I know I don't trust most government employees (no offense anyone).  I would also like an elaboration on that. Will the private keys be individually printed per coin (ie on a separate piece of paper per coin), or all 20 private keys be together on a list?Will the private key paper be sealed in a way that if someone has access to it (ie reads it), it would be clearly visually indicated as read/breached? This is important for any potential secondary market sales....Also, having the private key on paper, means that someone could easily move the funds WITHOUT breaching the hologram. If this is the case then.... I cannot see why the differentiation of FUNDED and BUYER FUNDED on the hologram.... On both cases, the private key of the coins will be knownEdit: reading the sentence a few times, another interpretation might be that: one copy of the private key will be printed on paper & the other copy, put on the coin itself (laser engraved on coin?) under the holo. Hence the printed paper will be under the hologram too? dunno....it says that only one will be printed on paper, hence I was wondering in what medium the other will be....

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: OP has been updated with the clarification on the key item visually.Hope this helps.

comments.author: smoothie
comments.body: It has been brought to my attention that some people would prefer the idea of a 10-coin set with all the art variations.I will consider it and post an update to the thread later today should I decide to go that route.Originally I had planned for 4-coin sets, but I can see the request as a valid one.Thanks for the input guys!Aloha
